-- Create menu table
CREATE TABLE menu (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT gen_random_uuid(),
  name TEXT NOT NULL,
  price DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
  spicy BOOLEAN DEFAULT false,
  image_id TEXT,
  description TEXT,
  category TEXT,
  is_vegetarian BOOLEAN DEFAULT false,
  is_popular BOOLEAN DEFAULT false,
  created_at TIMESTAMPTZ DEFAULT NOW(),
  updated_at TIMESTAMPTZ DEFAULT NOW()
);

-- Enable RLS on menu
ALTER TABLE menu ENABLE ROW LEVEL SECURITY;

-- Menu is publicly readable
CREATE POLICY "Menu items are viewable by everyone" 
  ON menu FOR SELECT 
  USING (true);

-- Only authenticated users can insert/update menu (for admin functionality later)
CREATE POLICY "Authenticated users can insert menu items" 
  ON menu FOR INSERT 
  TO authenticated 
  WITH CHECK (true);

CREATE POLICY "Authenticated users can update menu items" 
  ON menu FOR UPDATE 
  TO authenticated 
  USING (true);

-- Create users table (extends auth.users)
CREATE TABLE users (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY REFERENCES auth.users(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  name TEXT NOT NULL,
  phone TEXT,
  email_verified BOOLEAN DEFAULT false,
  phone_verified BOOLEAN DEFAULT false,
  created_at TIMESTAMPTZ DEFAULT NOW(),
  updated_at TIMESTAMPTZ DEFAULT NOW()
);

-- Enable RLS on users

-- Users can view and update their own profile

  ON users FOR SELECT 
  USING (auth.uid() = id);

CREATE POLICY "Users can update their own profile" 
  ON users FOR UPDATE 
  USING (auth.uid() = id);

CREATE POLICY "Users can insert their own profile" 
  ON users FOR INSERT 
  WITH CHECK (auth.uid() = id);

-- Create addresses table
CREATE TABLE addresses (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT gen_random_uuid(),
  user_id UUID NOT NULL REFERENCES auth.users(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  label TEXT NOT NULL, -- 'Home', 'Work', 'Other'
  street_address TEXT NOT NULL,
  city TEXT NOT NULL,
  postcode TEXT NOT NULL,
  contact_name TEXT,
  is_default BOOLEAN DEFAULT false,
  created_at TIMESTAMPTZ DEFAULT NOW(),
  updated_at TIMESTAMPTZ DEFAULT NOW()
);

-- Enable RLS on addresses
ALTER TABLE addresses ENABLE ROW LEVEL SECURITY;

-- Users can manage their own addresses
CREATE POLICY "Users can view their own addresses" 
  ON addresses FOR SELECT 
  USING (auth.uid() = user_id);

CREATE POLICY "Users can insert their own addresses" 
  ON addresses FOR INSERT 
  WITH CHECK (auth.uid() = user_id);

CREATE POLICY "Users can update their own addresses" 
  ON addresses FOR UPDATE 
  USING (auth.uid() = user_id);

CREATE POLICY "Users can delete their own addresses"

-- Create payment_methods table
CREATE TABLE payment_methods (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT gen_random_uuid(),
  user_id UUID NOT NULL REFERENCES auth.users(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  type TEXT NOT NULL, -- 'card', 'paypal', 'apple_pay', 'google_pay', 'cash'
  last4 TEXT,
  brand TEXT,
  expiry_month TEXT,
  expiry_year TEXT,
  holder_name TEXT,
  is_default BOOLEAN DEFAULT false,
  created_at TIMESTAMPTZ DEFAULT NOW(),
  updated_at TIMESTAMPTZ DEFAULT NOW()
);

-- Enable RLS on payment_methods

-- Create orders table
CREATE TABLE orders (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT gen_random_uuid(),
  user_id UUID NOT NULL REFERENCES auth.users(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  order_type TEXT NOT NULL, -- 'delivery' or 'collection'
  status TEXT NOT NULL DEFAULT 'pending', -- 'pending', 'confirmed', 'preparing', 'out_for_delivery', 'ready_for_collection', 'delivered', 'completed', 'cancelled'
  subtotal DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
  delivery_fee DECIMAL(10, 2) DEFAULT 0,
  discount DECIMAL(10, 2) DEFAULT 0,
  total DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
  payment_method_id UUID REFERENCES payment_methods(id),
  payment_type TEXT, -- 'card', 'cash', etc.
  delivery_address_id UUID REFERENCES addresses(id),
  delivery_address_text TEXT, -- Snapshot of address at time of order
  contact_phone TEXT,
  special_instructions TEXT,
  created_at TIMESTAMPTZ DEFAULT NOW(),
  updated_at TIMESTAMPTZ DEFAULT NOW()
);

-- Enable RLS on orders
ALTER TABLE orders ENABLE ROW LEVEL SECURITY;

-- Users can view their own orders

  ON orders FOR SELECT 
  USING (auth.uid() = user_id);

CREATE POLICY "Users can insert their own orders" 
  ON orders FOR INSERT 
  WITH CHECK (auth.uid() = user_id);

CREATE POLICY "Users can update their own orders" 
  ON orders FOR UPDATE 
  USING (auth.uid() = user_id);

-- Create order_items table
CREATE TABLE order_items (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT gen_random_uuid(),
  order_id UUID NOT NULL REFERENCES orders(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  menu_item_id UUID REFERENCES menu(id),
  menu_item_name TEXT NOT NULL, -- Snapshot of name at time of order

  created_at TIMESTAMPTZ DEFAULT NOW()

  USING (
    EXISTS (
      SELECT 1 FROM orders 
      WHERE orders.id = order_items.order_id 
      AND orders.user_id = auth.uid()
    )
  );

CREATE POLICY "Users can insert their own order items" 
  ON order_items FOR INSERT 
  WITH CHECK (
    EXISTS (
      SELECT 1 FROM orders 
      WHERE orders.id = order_items.order_id 
      AND orders.user_id = auth.uid()
    )
  );

BEGIN

  RETURN NEW;
END;
$$ LANGUAGE plpgsql;
